name: api-explorer
description: Open source components that make up ReadMe's API explorer

scripts.test: eslint -f unix example && lerna run test
scripts.example: node scripts/update-example-swagger-files && budo example/index.jsx --dir example -- -t babelify -p livereactload --extension .jsx
scripts.build: watchify packages/api-explorer-ui/src/index.jsx -t [ babelify ] -o 'derequire > packages/api-explorer-ui/dist/index.js' --extension jsx --standalone ApiExplorer

author: Dom Harrington <dom@harrington-mail.com>
